snippet.title: Kid Canary & The Midnight Tower (itch.io video)
snippet.description:
Kid Canary & The Midnight Tower is a game built around randomized turn-based battles with monsters w/ clicking being the main way of interacting. Every item is a stat boost & every attack takes Kid closer to the final floor of the Midnight Tower.

https://fakegamercomics.itch.io/kidcanarymidnighttower

It's a chill game about battling monsters in a scary dreamlike dungeon.
